Mentan Gugat Majalah Tempo 100 M, Syahrul Yasin Limpo: Belum Tahu
07 Nov 2019, 09:20 by Eko Wahyudi, Rr. Ariyani Yakti Widyastuti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Menteri Pertanian menggugat Majalah Tempo terkait laporan investigasi Majalah Tempo edisi 9-15 September 2019 berjudul "Gula-Gula Dua Saudara". Gugatan perdata tersebut didaftarkan ke Pengadilan Negeri Jakarta Selatan pada 18 Oktober 2019.
Situs Sistem Informasi Pelayanan Publik (SIPP) Pengadilan Negeri Jakarta Selatan mencatat nama pihak penggugat Menteri Pertanian Republik Indonesia dan pendaftar gugatan Sabarman Saragih. Sedangkan pihak tergugat tercatat tiga orang, yakni PT Tempo Inti Media Tbk. cq Majalah Tempo, Arif Zulkifli selaku Pemimpin Redaksi Majalah Tempo, dan Bagja Hidayat selaku penanggung Jawab Berita Investigasi Majalah Tempo.
Pada gugatan dengan nomor perkara 901/Pdt.G/2019/PN JKT.SEL itu, penggugat meminta Pengadilan menghukum para tergugat membayar ganti rugi berupa kerugian materil senilai Rp 22.042.000 dan kerugian immateriil Rp100 juta.
Menteri Pertanian juga meminta Majalah Tempo memohon maaf di Majalah Tempo dan surat kabar nasional selama 7 hari dengan ukuran setengah halaman. Di samping itu, Tempo juga diminta meletakkan sita jaminan terhadap Gedung Tempo yang terletak di Jl Palmerah Barat No.8 Jakarta Selatan.
Menanggapi hal tersebut Menteri Pertanian Kabinet Indonesia Maju Syahrul Yasin Limpo mengaku belum mengetahui terkait gugatan itu. "Aku belum tahu, tuh," kata Syahrul di Kementerian Koordinator Perekonomian, Jakarta, Kamis, 7 November 2019.
Syahrul juga mengaku masih belum mengetahui substansi yang dilayangkan dalam gugatan tersebut. Diberondong sejumlah pertanyaan, ia hanya berlalu sambil menuruni tangga Kementerian Koordinator Bidang Perekonomian dan bergegas memasuki kendaraan roda empatnya.
Ketika dikonfirmasi lebih jauh, Kepala Biro Hukum Kementerian Pertanian Maha Matahari Eddy Purnomo, hanya meminta Majalah Tempo untuk mengikuti proses yang ada. "Iya itu sudah ikuti saja prosesnya," kata dia melalui sambungan telepon, Kamis, 7 November 2019.
Sebelumnya, Pemimpin Redaksi Majalah Tempo Wahyu Dhyatmika meminta Kementerian Pertanian untuk mengikuti jalur gugatan di Dewan Pers. “Kami berharap Kementerian Pertanian mengikuti proses di Dewan Pers,” kata Wahyu pada Rabu, 6 November 2019.

Mentan Sues 100 M Tempo Magazine, Syahrul Yasin Limpo: Don't Know Yet
Nov 7 2019, 09:20 by Eko Wahyudi, Rr. Ariyani Yakti Widyastuti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The Minister of Agriculture is suing Tempo Magazine regarding the investigation report of the 9-15 September 2019 edition of Tempo entitled "Sugar of Two Brothers". The civil lawsuit was registered with the South Jakarta District Court on October 18, 2019.
The South Jakarta District Court's Public Service Information System (SIPP) website records the name of the plaintiff of the Minister of Agriculture of the Republic of Indonesia and registrar of lawsuit Sabarman Saragih. While the defendants listed three people, namely PT Tempo Inti Media Tbk. cq Tempo Magazine, Arif Zulkifli as Editor in Chief of Tempo Magazine, and Bagja Hidayat as the person in charge of Tempo Magazine Investigation News.
In the lawsuit with case number 901 / Pdt.G / 2019 / PN JKT.SEL, the plaintiff asked the court to punish the defendants to pay compensation in the form of material losses amounting to Rp22,042,000 and immaterial losses of Rp100 million.
The Minister of Agriculture also asked Tempo Magazine to apologize in Tempo Magazine and national newspapers for 7 days with a size of half a page. In addition, Tempo was also asked to put a seizure of collateral for the Tempo Building located on Jl Palmerah Barat No.8 South Jakarta.
Responding to this the Indonesian Cabinet of Agriculture Minister Maju Syahrul Yasin Limpo claimed not to know about the lawsuit. "I don't know yet, tuh," said Syahrul at the Coordinating Ministry for Economic Affairs, Jakarta, Thursday, November 7, 2019.
Syahrul also claimed to still not know the substance posted in the lawsuit. Diberondong a number of questions, he just passed down the stairs of the Coordinating Ministry for Economic Affairs and rushed into his four-wheeled vehicle.
When further confirmed, the Head of the Legal Bureau of the Ministry of Agriculture Maha Matahari Eddy Purnomo, only asked Tempo Magazine to follow the existing process. "Yes, it has just followed the process," he said via telephone, Thursday, November 7, 2019.
Previously, Editor in Chief of Tempo Magazine, Wahyu Dhyatmika, asked the Ministry of Agriculture to follow suit in the Press Council. "We hope that the Ministry of Agriculture follows the process in the Press Council," Wahyu said on Wednesday, November 6, 2019.
